data.eml:eml: The status of Cuvierina spoeli Rampal, 2002 and Cuvieria oryza Benson, 1835 (Gastropoda, Pteropoda, Cuvierinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Janssen, Arie W. (2018): The status of Cuvierina spoeli Rampal, 2002 and Cuvieria oryza Benson, 1835 (Gastropoda, Pteropoda, Cuvierinidae). Zootaxa 4459 (2): 369-375, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4459.2.9
